title: Frozen in 1-5 sec after loading
body:
Hello League og Legends i have problem. When i go in to agame so after 5 sec my screen frozen 
please help me!

replies.body: I am here to help! Did you recently update Windows 10? There is an issue where some players are freezing due to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disable it for now, and it should resolve your issue.  Let me know!
